summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 METAL FABRICATION BOAT TRAILER (NA).  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE BRAKES WERE DEFECTIVE. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A MANUFACTURERS RECALL TO REPAIR THE BRAKES BUT THE MANUFACTURER ADVISED THAT THE RECALL WAS EXPIRED.  THE DEALER WAS NOT NOTIFIED AND THE FAILURE WAS NOT REPAIRED.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 100.
